Description: Metal Color refers to the color of the metals present in the product. Possible values are Black, White, etc.
Strap Material refers to the substance used to make the strap of the particular product. Possible values are Leather, Plastic, Metal, Ceramic, etc.

Description: Color refers to the standard set of colors defined for the refiner on the Flipkart browse page. It is a Multi-Text attribute which means that a maximum of 3 color options can be chosen to represent a product. The value 'Multicolor' should be chosen if the product has a blend of colors, that is, 4 or more color options.

Design refers to the drawing/sketch/designs/accents on the product by means of printing, embellishments, metal decorative attachments, diamantes, leather work, etc. Possible values are Metal Gold Logo Design on Arms, Metal Brackets on Sides, Rose-gold Ends for the Arms of the Sunglasses, etc.
Sample values: printed||stylish sunglass||silver logo on sunglasses||stylish||self||mirrored lens||uv protection lens||its very comfortable spectacles||gradient||mirrored||decent look||black digital printing||plain||filigree brow bar||light weight||kabir singh||regular||oval||round||italy||uv protection||solid||sunglasses combo||aviator||wayfarer||very comfortable design

Description: Detail Placement refers to the print or design placed on particular place of the product.
Dial Color refers to the color of the dial on the product. Possible values are Black, Blue, Grey, etc.
Dial Shape refers to the physical form of the dial on the product. Possible values are Round, Square, Oval, Rectangle, Triangle, Contemporary, Tonneau, etc.
Face Type refers to the type of face structure that the pair of sunglasses would be suitable for.
Finish refers to the final appearance given to the base material of a product. Possible values are Glossy, Matte, Brushed, Hammered, etc.
Sample values: fine finish||shinny||rhodium plated||full finished||glossy||matte||good pearls||matte finish premium quality||classic||bridal set||silver||gold||fine||shimmer||glossy & matte||antique||satin||oxidised||handmade||glossy and matte||gold finish||matte & glossy||handcrafted||brushed||gold plated||glossy antique||golden||copper||shiny

Description: Frame refers to the amount of closure by the frame that has been provided around the lens of the product.
Frame Arm Type refers to the material that holds the lens of the product intact. Possible values are Metal, Plastic, etc.
Frame Color refers to the product's frame color. Possible values are Brown, Red, Gold, Steel, etc.
Frame Material refers to the substance used to make the frame of a particular product.
Gemstone refers to the jewels found on the product.
Ideal For refers to which gender the product would be most suitable for.
Leather Type refers to the type of leather used in the making of the product. This is not applicable for non-leather products.
Earring Length refers to the overall dimension of a earring.
Sample values: small(smaller than ear lobe)||med(ear lobe size)||big(bigger than ear lobe)||none

Description: Lens Material refers to the substance used to make the lens of a particular product. Possible values are Glass, Plastic, Fiberglass, etc.
Base Material refers to the substance used to make the bezel/case/body of a particular product.
Material refers to the substance used to make a particular product.
Sample values: genuine leather||valvet||denier||leatherette||synthetic||p.u.||nylon polyester||tsa ( transportation security administration)||plush||neoprene||leather||polyster||abs||jute||denier, polyester||fabric||pvc||polyester||nylon||canves||canvas||denim||velvet||pvc ||polycarbonate||pu leather||pu||cotton||artificial leather||denier, polyster||metal||soft||polypropylene||soft fabric

Description: Occasion refers to the type of occasion that the product is suited for.
Ornamentation Type refers to the decorative elements added to the product to enhance its appearance and make it more attractive
Bag Design refers to any pattern, drawing or sketch on the product. Possible values are Animal Print, Graphic Print, Bow on the Handle, etc.
